1.content:
The heat of the day hits me as I walk out of the air-conditioned school. Luckily my house is within a ten-minute walking distance. I follow the track to the back of the field where there is a gate which connects to a campus of ugly glass office buildings. By cutting through here, I can get home faster. A lot of insurance companies and laboratories I have never heard of are located in this office park. As I walk behind the identical buildings that lead to my street, I notice something shiny in the grass. Curiosity gets the better of me, and I stop to check it out.

The object is some sort of electrical device which looks a little bit like an old fashioned remote. On one end there is a small satellite. The face of the invention includes two buttons, a dial, and a call out screen. One of the buttons is labeled "Shrink" the other "Revert." Curiosity peaked, I wonder if this is real or just some prank. I look around to make sure no one is watching. A little voice in the back of my head tells me I should try and find somebody to give this to so that it can get back to the rightful owner. However, curiosity wins, and I pocket the device.

When I get home, I go into my room and shut the door. Pulling the device out, I point it at my chair and hit shrink. It whirs for about ten seconds before a beam of red light shoots out the end and hits the chair. I watch the chair dwindle before my eyes, stopping when it is small enough for a mouse. Mouth open in surprise I pick up the tiny chair. It looks just like the original, only little. I can even see the punch stain on the seat cover. After placing it back on the ground, I hit the revert button. This time a blue beam of light comes out, and the chair returns to normal size. With some testing, l determine that the dial changes the degree to which an object shrinks. At this point, I notice a note scrawled on the back in sharpie. It says "Prototype #B86 - Appears to be in working order after multiple tests. Possible side effect: indestructibility."

This is so cool! I have come across a prototype for an invention you would expect in a Sci-fi book. Ever since seeing Honey We Shrunk Ourselves, I have been fascinated with the idea of shrinking. Next...
1.title: The Shrink Ray

choices: Into my sister's room to play a prank

11.content:
The first thing that came to my mind when I found that the device really worked was a strange desire to shrink myself. I have always wondered what it would be like to tiny. Now I have a way to find out. There is no way of knowing if this device is safe, let alone advisable for use on humans. Nonetheless, I want to try and see what will happen. I turn the dial to the settings that should make me 1/70 of my size, roughly half an inch tall. After pointing the satellite at myself, I press the button. The red light shoots out and hits me in the chest. Instantly I become tingly. Then the room rapidly gets bigger. The shrink ray slips out of my hand and lands with a thud on the carpet — a few seconds later, my decent downward stops.

I am so small that my feet sink into the carpet, which now looks like a field of long tan grass. In front of me lies the shrink ray, many times bigger than me. I did not think of the fact that I would not have a way to get myself back to normal. Oh well, I will just have to get the help of one of my siblings. For now though, I decide to go exploring. Everything looks so different when you are only an inch tall. My room looks like an exotic landscape. I walk over to my tennis shoes. The one is turned on its side, and I can see a piece of gum stuck to the bottom. They are so big they could crush a house. Next to them lies a pair of my underwear that could make a tent.

I walk over to one of the house plants I keep in my room. The wicker pot is easy for me to climb. Inside is a jungle of green leaves and stems. I pause relief myself before continuing on. I can jump out of the pot, onto my beanbag, and slide to the floor.

Next, I crawl under my door and decide to go to...

Realizing that I am hungry, I decide to go to the kitchen first. What better task to start with than scavenging for food? The hard floors in the hall are much easier to walk on then the carpet in my room. When I get to the stairs, I look down. Each step is like a mini cliff. Luckily the bottom of the railing forms a slide which is just my size. I hop up onto the decorative wood, and then I take the plunge. My little makeshift slide is fast, and I am at the bottom in no time.

My sister's massive high tops sit in front of me. She was always getting in trouble for leaving them lying around. I walk past the house-sized shoes into the kitchen. The cabinets extend upward like a skyscraper. Up on the counter, I can just make out a massive bag of chips and a plate of cookies, the perfect snack. I walk around the kitchen, trying to find a way up. The cabinets are too smooth for me to climb. The ivy plant which dangles off the counter might work. Suddenly I see a huge spider. It is coming straight towards me. I hurry to the long green vine of the ivy and pull myself up. It is surprisingly easy for me to climb.

Just as I make it to the top, I hear voices. My sister Abby and her friend Kylie come into the kitchen. They are massive compared to me. I quickly scramble behind the bag of chips, not sure if I am ready to be found by two teenage girls. From my hiding place, I see them open the fridge and pull out some soda and hot dogs. My sister pops the hot dogs into the microwave. Then she walks straight towards me. Abby lifts herself up and sits on the counter. Her colossal body blocks my view. She reaches for the bag of chips, exposing me. With a loud crunch, see chews. It terrifies me a little to know that she could easily swallow me whole. Abby takes a big drink of root beer. 'Bbbbrrraaaapppp' A huge boyish burp escapes her mouth.

"Dude," says Kylie, impressed, "That was a good one. Let me see if I can top it." I can just see Kylie around Abby as she chugs her soda down. The giantess puts her hand over her stomach, exposed by the crop top she is wearing. 'Burpppp Burppp Burppp' Kylee lets out three little burps."Dang it, I was hoping for a bigger one.

The microwave beeps, and Abby stands up. In the process, she tips the bag of chips which come cascading over me. "Shoot," curses Abby, "I'm always such a klutz." She grabs a bowl and....

Obviously, I would have to look for something to give Maddie, but I'm not sure what yet. I weave my way through the sea of people. I hardly ever come to the mall because I can't stand the crowds. Also, I prefer online shopping when I am looking for something for myself.

Luckily the department store is less hectic, and I can get to the jewelry section without bumping into half a dozen people. A girl about my age with hair dyed purple is behind the counter. "How are you doing?" she asks with a smile.

"Pretty good," I respond automatically, not liking small talk.

"Is there any I can help you find?" she asks. I hesitate, feeling awkward asking, but end up describing the necklace. "We got a couple of those in different colors over there," she points to a turn-style display. Out of the comer of my eye, I notice her name tag says Alice. "Is this for someone special?"

"Umm….No…Just a friend," I feel my cheeks go a little red.

"Some friend. I wish I were the lucky girl," she says slightly flirtatiously, which makes me go even redder. As I go over to look at the different options, another customer walks up to the counter, and Alice goes to help them. I turn the display until I find one that is a deep green, Megan's favorite color. I pick it up to look at the price. It is a little outrageous, but I still want to consider it. I reach into my pocket for my phone to take a picture so I can compare it to other options. Instead, I pull out the shrink ray, accidentally pushing the button. I try an turn the ray from me, but it is too late. The beam hits me. The device slips out of my hand and slides behind the display. Instantly I become tingly, and the mall around me grows.

When I finally stop shrinking, everything looks completely different. The display case extends up like a skyscraper. On the floor in front of me lies the necklace, which looks like a massive snake now. Based on the size of everything around me, I would guess that I am an inch or less tall. In the distance, I see to massive sneakers go by, crushing a discarded cracker in the process. I need to get back to normal size. The trouble is that at this size, there is probably no way for me to operate the device. Before I can think of wat to do a shadow looms over me. I look-up and see…
141.title: Giant Necklace

1411.content:
Two huge Converse shoes come towards me. I look up to see Alice, who now looks to be tall as a skyscraper. Each step she takes causes the ground to shake a little. "Where did he go," I hear Alice mutter to herself. As she nears, she spots the necklace on the ground. Alice bends down to pick it up when she spots me. "What the hell?"

Two of her huge fingers wrap around my body. She lifts me up to the palm of her hand to examine me. Her skin is soft and warm, with a sweet scent of oranges. "I must be dreaming," she mutters. "Or tripping. I knew I shouldn't have eaten those brownies Justin made. It would be just like him to lace them with something."

"You are not dreaming," as I say the words, Alice jumps in fright, almost dropping me.

"What happened to you?" she asks.

"It's kind of a long story," I state.

Before I can start explaining, someone calls for Alice. "I will be right there," she responds as she stands up. Alice replaces the necklace on the display case. Looking down at me, she says. "You will have to tell me your story later; the boss needs me. I will have to hide you for now."

Without asking Alice stuffs me into her....
1411.title: Hiding Place

14111.content:
I am too shocked to do anything when Alice pulls her shirt forward and tucks me into her bra. She smells good, like sugar cookies. Her skin is soft and warm. Not really sure what to do, I just hang tight for the time being. This whole situation is so bizarre. I can't believe I shrunk and ended up in the shirt of an attractive girl.

Alice talks to her boss about the new shipment of clothes. Her voice sounds like it is being projected by a loud speaker. As Alice walks to the back to help with inventory, I bounce up and down against her skin. I start to slip further down her bra. Alice let's out a soft giggle. I'm not sure if she is doing on accident or purpose, but she keeps pushing me into her boob. To my embarrassment, I find myself getting a boner.

A short time later, I hear a door close and a lock being put in place. Alice's fingers pull me out of her shirt. "The coast is clear," she says as she places me in the palm of her hand. I see that we are in a bathroom. "Sorry about your little ride, I could not think of any other place to put you." Alice's face goes bright red.

"That is okay," I respond, also going red.

"So tell me shrimp boy, what happened to you," Alice asks with a grin, regaining some composure. I explain about finding the device, coming to the mall, and then accidentally shrinking myself. "Dude, no way. I have always thought it would be cool if shrinking was possible. Did you say you dropped it behind the display case?"

I nod, "If you can go get it for me, you should be able to return me to normal."

"Right, I will go look for it," she replies. "Just to be safe, I'd like to keep you with me." She grins as she puts be back into her shirt. I listen to her footsteps as she walks. After a little bit I feel myself shifting forward, and I realize she is bending over. Alice rummages around for a minute and then exclaims, "Got it!" When she gets back to the bathroom and pulls me out, Alice says...
14111.title: Alice's Bra

1412.content:
Two giant sneakers appear in front of me. I crane my neck up to see the massive legs of a teen girl. The skirt she wears looks like a school uniform. She towers over me like a skyscraper, and I can't really make out her face. I can, however, see her pink polka-dot underwear. The girl looks down at the necklace. "People can be so careless," she says disapprovingly, in a British accent, as she reaches for it. Her large hand wraps around the chain. I see that her fingernails are painted with an intricate design of the English flag.

As she lifts the necklace up, I realize that I am tangled in the other end of the chain. Quickly I try and free myself, but it is already too late. I rapidly rise into the air, swinging wildly. The girl doesn't seem to notice me. She is too busy admiring the gem on the other end. "Emeralds are my favorite," she murmurs to herself. "Maybe I can splurge, just this once."

I am still caught in the chain when the giant girl stands up. She walks to the counter where Alice stands. "How much for this necklace?"

"That one is thirty-five dollars," responds Alice, looking over the other girl's shoulder. "A cute guy was looking at those just a second ago. I wonder where he went."

The girl with the British accent shrugs, grinning. "I didn't see any cute guys. I'm painfully single right now, so I would have noticed him. Oh, well, I think I will buy this."

Alice rings the girl up and takes her money. "Would you like a bag?"

"No, I will wear it out. Thanks anyway." I am again lifted into the air. The chain straightens, and suddenly I am falling. My heart pounds, and I am sure I am about to die. Then I slam into something hard and realize that I am on the gemstone. I manage to hold on as the giantess places the piece of jewelry around her neck. Each step she takes is like an earthquake to me.

I need to get her attention to get myself back to normal size, but I am not sure if it is a good idea while she is walking. I hang on as she walks....
1412.title: Sold

choices: Still surprised, and a little concerned
1413.content:
Two giant sneakers appear in front of me. Looking up, I see skinny legs in jeans. I have to crane my neck all the way to see the teenage girl, about 13 or 14, looking down at me in surprise. She wears a striped t-shirt which is a little too big and has long light brown hair. We just stare at each other for a minute.

The giantess girl is the first to react. She kneels on the ground and reaches for me. Her fingernails are rough, probably from a bad habit of biting them. It feels strange to have her giant fingers wrap around my body. She stands up, looking around to see if anyone else noticed. Without a word, she makes her way towards the bathrooms. After walking into one of the family bathrooms and locking the door, my giantess captor looks down at me, her expression...
1413.title: Giantess Teen

choices: The boy starts eating some of his gummy worms
He feeds gummy worms to his girlfriend
142.content:
Maddie and Megan both have sweet tooth's, so the candy store at the mall is the perfect place to get them a gift. Afterward, I could go looking for something more heartfelt for Megan. I weave my way through the sea of people towards the strong sugary smell. With floor to ceiling displays, you can find sweets from all around the world at this place. Personally, I am a chocolate person and don't like any of the hard candies or gummies. Megan, on the other hand, loves gummy worms. I once watched her eat an entire bag in one sitting. She can somehow eat whatever she wants and still stay thin.

I walk over to the section that is nothing but different flavors of gummy worms. After grabbing a bag, I lean forward and open the bin with root beer favored ones. In the process, I bump my leg against the display, and I hear whirring sound. Before I have a chance to register what the sound is, a bright light goes off in my pocket. I instantly become tingly. I must have set off the device.

In a panic, I lose my balance and fall forward as I shrink. For a moment I am free-falling, then I land with a soft thump. The smell of root beer fills my nostrils. I am sitting in a pile of huge gummy worms. Above me, a loud clunk startles me. I look up to see that the lid came down, trapping me inside this plastic prison.

Outside I can see the giant figures of people entering the store. No one seems to have noticed me shrinking. I check my pocket for the device, but it is not there. In a futile attempt, I try to climb out. Unfortunately, the walls are much too slippery. I'm not sure what to do next. Even if I could get the attention of one of the giants, what would they think if they found me?

Just then a boy and a girl of about 14 years old come over to the gummy worm section, holding hands. "Dude, these are my favorite," exclaims the girl, who is wearing a crop top that shows off her slender stomach.

"I once swallowed a live worm on a dare," the boy with the curly blonde hair says.

"Really?! What did it taste like?" she asks, impressed.

"A little bit like dirt, but luckily I didn't have to chew it. I actually could feel it squirming down my throat," he says, letting go of her hand and grabbing a bag.

"Dude! That is so sick," her expression is between disgust and impressed. She grabs a bag too, opening the bin just down from me which is filled with blue raspberry gummy worms. I watch her pick up the scoop and take a big pile of worms. The two giants begin filling their bags up with different flavors.

To my horror, the boy's massive hand is right over me. I try and scramble out of the way as the silver scoop comes straight towards me. It is not very easy moving over giant and sticky gummy worms. Everything below me shakes, and suddenly I am rising upwards.

A moment later, everything shifts again, and I slide downwards into his bag. I can't even move with all the gummy worms surrounding me. Through the multi-color candy, I see that he is heading for the cash register. Each step he takes tosses me around. The boy buys both bags of gummy worms.

They head outside to the bus stop. While they are waiting...
142.title: Shrunk to a snack

choices: His stomach acids begin to dissolve me
1421.content:
The boy's colossal hand enters the bag, grabbing a red and yellow gummy worm. "I like to mix flavors," he says as he pops both into his mouth at once. I watch in horror as he chews, pulverizing the python-sized gummy worm, and then swallows. "My favorite combo is root beer and cheery." His big fingers are once again rummaging through the bag. Suddenly I am being lifted into the air, and I realize that I am stuck to the gummy worm that he picked. I try and scramble free, but then he tosses it into his mouth.

I land on his moist wet tongue. I just manage to avoid being crushed to death by the big white teeth as they chew up the gummy worms. The monster-like tongue moves, pushing me backward. With nothing to grab onto, I slip down the boy's throat. His slimy esophagus pushes me towards his stomach. Panicking, I try and fight it, but it is to no avail. "Ugg, ever get that feeling that you have a pill stuck," I hear the boy say, "I've got that right now."

A second later, his throat is flooded with soda, and I am sent downwards. I land with a plop into his stomach. I really don't want to end up as food for a teenage boy. Next..
1421.title: Eaten Alive

choices: Get our via the front door (her mouth)
Go to the back door (let nature take it's course)
1422.content:
"What is your favorite flavor," the giant boy asks the girl.

"Root beer," she responds.

The boy's giant hand enters the bag, fingers rummaging around until they find one of the root beer flavored gummy worms. Unfortunately, I am stuck to the one he grabs and gets lifted up into the air. I try and get free as the boy says, "Open up."

He places the opposite end in his mouth and then dangles the worm over the girl's mouth. She giggles as she pretends to be a baby bird. I can see down her throat as he leans closer to her. The giantess's mouth envelopes me as she locks lips with the boy. They kiss for a second before she bites off her end of the worm.

I manage to roll out of the way just as the massive teeth pulverize the gummy worm. Her mouth is moist and warm. Before I can think of what to do, the enormous tongue lifts me up. I begin to slide backward with the chewed up gummy worm. I try and stop myself, but it is too late, I have fallen into her throat.

I panic as her esophagus begins pushing me down like a meal. I try and fight it, but it is strong. The girl coughs. "I swallowed it down the wrong tube," I hear her say. It is a peculiar sensation to be inside someone while they are talking. A second later, her esophagus is flooded with soda, which forces me down faster.

I land with a plop in a cavern, which must be her stomach. In the darkness, I can feel the half-digested food around me. This is definitely the grossest place I have ever been. On the bright side, I seem unharmed by her stomach acids. Nonetheless, I want to get out of here. I decide to..
1422.title: Down the Hatch

choices: The girl's hand, saying she should hide me
1423.content:
"What's that?" mutters the giant boy, his eyes sweeping over me. He opens the bag and inserts his massive hand. After rummaging through, his fingers find me. I get pinched between his thumb and forefinger; then, he lifts me up.

"What is it?" asks the girl.

"It is a tiny dude," he replies, astonished.

"You mean a toy?" she questions, a confused look on her face.

"No, I mean a real-life person. He can't even be an inch tall." I am dropped into the palm of his hand. I sit up, looking around the huge hand. Each line in his skin stands out to me. He raises me up so that she can see me.

"Oh my God," she exclaims, extending her giant finger to touch me. She presses me down lightly, causing me to fall on to my back. "I can't believe he is real. What do you think happened to him?"

I try to answer for myself, but the boy talks over me, so they don't hear. "I don't know, maybe an experiment went wrong. Either way, I think he is cool."

"I have always wanted a tiny person as a pet. Do you think we can keep him?" she asks. The last thing I want is to become their pet. I stand up, a little shaky on the fleshy surface beneath my feet. Before I can even think about how to get down, he closes his fist around me.

"I mean, I don't see why not," he replies, "Where would this little guy go anyway. He would probably get crushed in less than an hour." Through cracks between his fingers, I can see the bus approaching.

"We better hide him," she states.

"You are right," he responds and places me in...
1423.title: Found by the Giant Teens

choices: The giantess checks to see what is in the shoe
143.content:
Megan has been talking about the new Hello Kitty Converse shoes for a while. She said that her dad refused to get buy them because they were "little kid shoes," despite the fact they came in adult sizes. The smell of rubber is always a little overwhelming at shoe stores, in my opinion. I walk up and down the aisles until I find them. Luckily I know Megan's foot size since I had once did a science project comparing foot size and height. The two of us were partners. Thinking of that project reminds me of the truth or dare game we had played the night we worked on the assignment. Megan dared me to lick the soles of her feet, which I did because it was a triple dog dare.

I sort through the boxes until I find the right size, opening the box to make sure they look alright. Another one of the boxes falls off the shelf and hits my leg. Suddenly I hear a whirring noise and realize that it must have activated the shrink ray. There is a flash of light and suddenly my skin gets tingly. I become dizzy for a moment and the shoes clatter out of my hand into the floor.

When my head stops spinning I survey my surroundings. In front of me lie two massive shoe boxes. The sneakers that had hit my leg fell out of their box and were laying on their side. In the distance I hear the voices. I look and see two giant teen girls. One looks to be about my age and has purple hair. The other girl is probably her little sister, about 13 years old, with blonde hair. Their legs look like redwood trees.

The two giantess walk towards me. The younger girl is only wearing bright green socks, I crane my neck up to see that see is holding her shoes. Her massive foot stops right in front of me. To avoid getting stepped on, I quickly dart into the shoe I had knocked down.

"Here they are," booms one of the girls. "Now I just need to find my size." I hear them rummaging through the boxes. "Oh wait, here they are on the ground." Suddenly the shoe I am in shakes as the giantess girl turns it upright. I look up to see the giant socked foot coming straight towards me. I scramble to the toe of the shoe as all light is blocked out. I get pinned down by the massive foot. The giant girl walks around, each step she takes feels like an earthquake.

Next…
143.title: Giant Foot

choices: Get the attention of the younger girl
Find the older purple haired girl
1431.content:
"They fit perfectly," booms the younger girl wearing the shoes.

"Do you want to get them?"says the other girl, who I assume is her older sister.

"Yep," she replies as she slips her feet out of the shoes. Before I can react, the giantess sets them back into their box, trapping me inside. Since I can't see what is going on, I just have to listen. I hear their footsteps as they walk to the cashier. Then the guy at the front rings them up, blatantly flirting with the purple haired girl. There is a rustling sound and I realize that it is a paper bag. After the box is deposited in the bag, the girls walk into the noisy mall. With each step I am swung backwards and forwards like a pendulum.

I can tell the girls have gone outside since the voices have died down and the temperature has increased. A moment later I hear a car door open. The engine roars to life as they drive away. The calming sound of the car moving along makes me drowsy and I find myself drifting off.

When I wake up I realize that I am no longer in the car. Suddenly the lid of the box is lifted up and the shoe I am in is flooded with light. I see the girl's massive hand as she grabs the shoes, setting them down on the ground. I look up to see clothes hanging far above me. I must be inside her closet.

As she walks away I decide to climb out of the shoe. Landing with a soft thump on the carpet, I make my way past the other giant pairs of shoes. The girl's room is a mess. A pile of used tissues sits next to the overflowing trash can. Clothes, including pants, socks, and underwear are scattered on the floor by her bed. She has a bean bag which is infront of a TV. Around which there is a mess of food waste. An empty can off root beer sits on it's side, next to a half eaten bag of chips.

The giantess's massive socked foot nearly crushes me again as she walks over to the TV. She turns it on and grabs a X-Box remote, before flopping onto the bean bag. If I did not want to live the rest of my life in this teen girls room, I would need to get the attention of someone. The younger girl would be the easiest since she was right infront of me. On the other hand I am not sure how she would react. It might be safer to find the older girl.

Ultimately I decide to...
1431.title: Purchased

1432.content:
"Ugg, it feels like there is something in this shoe," I hear the younger girl say. Her massive foot exists, sending a wave of fresh air over me. It feels like I am inside an elevator as the shoe is lifted into the air. The ground shifts below my feet and I slide towards the heal of the shoe. I look up to see the giant girl staring down at me in shock, her hazel eyes wide. I can feel my heart pounding. This giant girl could probably squash me with her pinky finger. She glances over at her older sister, before reaching into the shoe and picking me up. I am unable to move, sandwiched between her huge fingers. The girl deposits me in the pocket of her shorts. I slip down near a piece of gum and a nickel that is as big as me.

The girl talks to her sister about the shoes as if nothing happened. I can't believe she just stuffed me into her pocket. I am unsure if I should try and reason with my giantess's captor or try and escape. Right now she is my best chance at getting back to normal size. On the other hand she could keep me as a pet if she wanted. Ultimately I decide to...
1432.title: Found by a Giantess Teen

1433.content:
The giant socked foot exits the shoe. "These are a little too big," the giantess girl states. "I think I need half a size smaller." With a thump, she drops the shoe back into the box. It gets dark again as she closes the lid.

I wait until I can't hear their voices anymore before climbing out of the shoe. Luckily the box has one of those holes in it so that I can pull myself out. Now that I have a moment to think, I realize that I don't know what happened to the shrink ray. It was in my pocket when it went off. I check to see if maybe it shrunk with me, but it is not there. I look around the massive towers of shoes, and then I spot it. The shrink ray is still normal size, lying partially underneath one of the shelves.

I make my way over to the device. Usually, it would be just a few steps away, but now it is a short walk. I am nearly there when two massive sneakers come crashing down, blocking my path. I crane my neck up to see a gigantic teen boy. He is wearing the store's uniform. I watch as he bends down to pick up the shoe boxes on the ground. Then he spots the shrink ray. "What's that?" he mutters to himself as he reaches for it. I decide to...
1433.title: Giant Employee

choices: Climb up to the table and get their attention
Head towards the garbage can and try to use the device
Too late, the boy is sitting down
144.content:
My stomach growls, so I decide to eat first. I don't really like fast food, so I go with the healthiest option, Subway. Despite being lean, I can eat an entire foot-long in one sitting. After finishing, I toss the wrapper into the garbage that is right next to me. As I am standing up, something clatters to the ground. I look to see that the shrink ray fell out of my pocket. Picking it up, I accidentally push the button. It whirs to life, and I panic trying to turn it off, but too late, the beam of light shoots out and hits me in the arm. I reflexively reach for the spot it hit, as though I had been shot, and the shrink ray slips out of my hand. It lands with a clunk in the garage can.

My skin becomes tingly, and a dizzying sensation overcomes me. I sit down. The food court rapidly grows around me. Once my downward motion stops, I see that I am standing on a large metal surface that is in the shape of a circle. It takes me a minute to realize that I am standing on the seat that I was sitting on just a second ago. Based on its size compared to me, I would guess that I am an inch or less. There is a big metal bar to the side of the round seat, which connects it to the table.

No one seems to have noticed what happened to me. My table is slightly secluded by large plants, so I guess if no one was looking my direction, they would not have seen me shrink. I'm not sure what to do next. The device that could get me back to normal is in the garbage can next to me. It would be quite the challenge to get to it, and even then, I'm not sure I could turn the dials. However, my alternatives are not much better. Getting the attention of one of the giants would be difficult, especially without getting squashed. Plus, what would they think if they found me?

Suddenly I remember my cell phone was in my pocket. Since my clothes shrank with me, it was only logical to assume that it did too. I reach into my pocket, and sure enough, my phone is in there. Unfortunately, it seems to have died. I feel like crying.

Just then I hear voices. I look up to see a giant teen boy and girl. They set their trays on the table.They set their trays on the table. I decide to..
144.title: Snack and Shrink

choices: Accidentally spills pizza sauce on me
She bumps the tray, sending me flying
1441.content:
The giantess girl sits down on the chair next to me, her belly button exposed by the crop top she wears. She looks to be about 14 or 15. I decide that while not ideal, getting up on the table will be safest. I really don't want to end up crushed like a bug underneath someone's shoe.

The metal poll connecting the chair to the table forms a steep incline, but I easily make my way to the top. In front of me there are salt and pepper shakers which tower over me. I step over pebble sized grains of salt and hide behind the shakers. I watch the teen boy pop a chicken nugget bigger than a car into his mouth, chewing it up like it is nothing. He takes a swig of soda and lets out a small burp. "Sorry," he mumbles, looking embarrassed as he glances over the girl.

"Dude, that was weak. I can do better than that," she takes a big drink of her soda, then places her hand on her stomach and leans forward. Bbbbrrrraaaaapppppp...an earth shattering burp escapes her mouth.

"Dang," the boy exclaims. "You've got skills. I didn't know..."

"That girls can burp too," she interjects.

"No, it's just that most girls are grossed out when I burp," he responds bashfully.

"Well I am not most girls," she says with a grin. They continue to eat. I hesitate, unsure if I want to get the attention of these teens or wait for someone else. However I decide that most of the people in the mall are teens, so I decide to go for it. I walk out from my hiding place. Neither of them are looking at me.

Cautiously I approach them. As I clamber up onto the girl's tray I watch as she takes a big bite out of her pizza. The giant girl reaches for a bread stick and then....
1441.title: To Be Eaten or Not To Be Eaten

choices: I am able to move the dials
I can not use the device at this size
1442.content:
I decide not to take my chances with the giant teens. There is no telling how they might react. I would rather help myself anyway, so I walk to the edge of the chair. The metal leg goes to the ground at an angle. I could get to the floor in seconds by slide down the leg. I try not to look at how far down it is as I step down onto the slick metal. My heart pounds as I sit down a scoot forwards. Lightning fast I zoom to the ground.

I land hard on my butt. It takes me a minute to catch my breath before I stand up. The floor is so sticky I can barely walk. My shoes get so stuck that I have to leave them behind. Once I get to the trash can I realize that this really the best plan. I have to climb to the top of the bin which looks like it is at least 20 stories above me. Then I will jump into a massive pit of garbage and hope that I can return myself to normal size. However I am not the type of person that gives up easily, so I start to climb.

Luckily the garage can has decorative holes which make for good hand holds. Nonetheless , it still takes me a long time to climb. The giants don't seem to notice me as they toss there waste into the bin. I make it to the top after what feels like over an hour. I take in the view before walking to the edge of the pit. The inside of the garage can is a dark abyss. I can just make out some wrappers, soda cups, and partially eaten food.

Before I can bring myself to jump down, somebody comes with a tray of garbage. As they are tossing it in they inadvertently knock into me. I go flying downwards with a yell. A few seconds later I land with a splut into a wad of chewing gum. It takes me a minute to free myself from the sticky substance. I climb over a discarded bra before I finally make it to the shrink ray. I have to dig it out from under a used tissue and the leftovers of someone's pasta. I reach to turn the dials and find that....
1442.title: My. Garbage

choices: I decide to climb the boy and try to get his attention
1443.content:
The boy looms over the chair I am on. He looks to be about fourteen, with dirty blonde hair. I stare up in awe at the the sheer size him. Before I have time to process, he begins to sit down, giving me the view of his jean-clad butt.

I try and scramble out of the way. Unfortunately I am not quick enough and his massive butt knocks me flat. I am completely sandwiched underneath him, unable to move. This is definitely one of the last places I want to be trapped.

I can hear the muffled sounds of the bustling mall. The boy and girl he is with are talking about the movie they just saw. I try and wiggle hopping to either get free or have him notice me. I manage to move one of my arms, but the rest of me is pinned down. I may be stuck here until they finish lunch.

"Hey guess what?" I hear the boy say.

"What?" the girl asks in response.

The giant teen boy shifts a little bit, his weight pressing down on me. Then a monster like sound erupts and his butt vibrates. I am overcome with a rotten egg smell. "I have to fart," the boy says mischievously.

"You are so gross," the girl says through giggles.

"Says the one who likes to burp on my face," he responds, also laughing. "Wait I think I might have another one." This time he lifts himself off the chair just a little bit. I cease the moment and scramble out from under him as he releases another fart. I just make it to the back of the chair as he thuds back down.

"Dude, I kinda feel bad for your underwear right now," the girl says laughing. Next…
1443.title: Farting Boy

info.brief_description: Ethan comes across a strange device that turns out to be a shrink ray.
info.description:
Characters

Ethan Law (POV)is a high school senior who is somewhat of a nerd. Despise his shyness many of the girls have a crush on him. Ethan is always curious to experiment and is willing to take risks. Ever since seeing Honey We Shrunk Ourselves, he has always wondered what it would be like to shrink.

Abby Law is Ethan's 15 year old sister. She has a playful personality and gets along well with her older brother. Abby is a cross between a girly girl and a tomboy. She likes to get pretty, but she can also burp on command. Abby spends a lot of her time hanging out with Addie.

Dallas Law is Ethan's 13 year old brother. Dallas resents his older brother because he feels like their parents expected him to be just like Ethan. The young teen is athletic and is on a coed juniors soccer team.

Jake Barnes is Ethan's best friend. As an extrovert, he is quite the opposite of Ethan. Jake is on most of the sports teams and is part of the popular group at school. He is adventurous and will never say no to a dare.

Rachel Barnes is Jake's thirteen year old sister. She likes to tease her brother and Ethan.

Maddie and Megan Jent are twins and live next door to Ethan. They are also seniors. Ethan has known them his whole life. He has a massive crush on both of them, but has a particular soft spot for Megan . They are both are in theater.

Kylie Triggs is Abby's best friend and is often hanging around the house. She has a crush on Ethan.

More to be added along the way.
